implementation.How_is_it_connected_to_implementation: Implements the subtraction operation as part of a calculator app. When the user selects option 2, it subtracts num2 from num1 and prints the result.
implementation.pseudo_code:
PRINT welcome message
LOOP forever:
    PRINT menu options
    GET user choice as integer
    GET num1 as integer input
    GET num2 as integer input
    IF choice == 1:
        PRINT num1 + num2
    ELSE IF choice == 2:
        PRINT num1 - num2
    ELSE IF choice == 3:
        PRINT num1 * num2
    ELSE IF choice == 4:
        PRINT num1 / num2
    ELSE IF choice == 5:
        PRINT 'Exiting...'
        BREAK
    PRINT newline

implementation.pseudo_code:
PRINT welcome message
WHILE true:
    PRINT menu options
    GET user choice as integer
    GET first number as integer
    GET second number as integer
    IF choice is 1:
        PRINT sum
    ELSE IF choice is 2:
        PRINT difference
    ELSE IF choice is 3:
        PRINT product
    ELSE IF choice is 4:
        PRINT division result (num1 / num2)
    ELSE IF choice is 5:
        PRINT exit message
        BREAK
    PRINT newline
